issue.title: wideanglecamera sensor renders incorrect background color

content.raw:
Although the WideAngleCamera render targets are initialized with background color, at the time they are initialized the color is the default gray. Camera background colors are updated in Scene::SetBackgoundColor, but that method directly updates the Camera::OgreViewport background color and cannot update the 6 viewports used for env map textures in the WideAngleCamera. 
Adding a virtual SetBackgroundColor method to the Camera class that could be overridden by WideAngleCamera would solve the problem.
